text: Heaven's Fire is a 1999 made-for-TV action movie film starring Eric Roberts and Jürgen Prochnow. ==Plot== The story involves a group of would-be burglars who attempt a daring daylight robbery of a Federal Building in Seattle, Washington. However, the criminals are forced to improvise when their getaway helicopter crashes and sets a deadly fire in the building. Also in the building is a former security guard (Eric Roberts) who is the only person who can stop the heist and save the innocent bystanders who are trapped in the burning building. ==See also== *List of firefighting films ==External links== * Category:1999 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:1999 action films Category:Films about firefighting Category:American television films Category:Saban Entertainment films Category:American action films == References ==
title: Heaven's Fire
